name: Winnie Ramos
text: It's very comfortable and very grateful bike and it's good for long raid and very comfortable and it's bit very nice with change silenser and nice power.

name: Kristy Bryan
text: I own this since 2018 i am very much happy with performance, Service on time resolves all mechanical issues.Never faced breakdown issues, Smooth on normal road and tough on rough roads, Safest bike in all mis-happening.

name: Celina Mckay
text: Royal Enfield Bullet 350 gives good mileage, it gives around 40kmpl. The comfort is pretty good but the new Bullet 350 BS6 model has a low ground clearance which is an issue I am facing right now.

name: Robyn Fitzpatrick
text: This is most valuable bike on Bangladesh amazing bike speechless no one reason this bike is losing money an bor bike.

name: Jenny Heath
text: Great experience, comfortable for riding, great in looks, nice and affordable service, overall great experience.

name: Bowers Pena
text: The bike is really good, It is perfect for long drives. The Bike comes with great tiers, battery. Single driver past 20 years.
